      • Trade

        public Trade(java.lang.String OwnerName,
     java.lang.String BorrowerName,
     Inventory OwnerItems,
     Inventory BorrowerItems)
        Creates a new trade between two people
        Parameters:
        OwnerName - The name of the Initiator
        BorrowerName - The name of the Receiver
        OwnerItems - The Initiators items that are being offered
        BorrowerItems - The Receivers items that the Initiator wants
        Throws:
        DateFormatException - This occurs when an improper date is given and can't be parsed
